Function Documentation

int uart_close ( port_t  port)

This functions closes the specified UART port.

Returns
Zero on success
int uart_flush ( port_t  port)

This function flushes the UART's TX/RX buffers.

Returns
Zero on success
int uart_getattr ( port_t  port,
uart_attr_t *  attr 
)

This function gets the UART attributes from the specified UART port.

Returns
Zero on success
int uart_getbyte ( port_t  port,
char *  c 
)

This function gets a single byte from the UART.

Returns
Zero on success; -1 if not data is avaiable to get.
int uart_open ( port_t  port)

This function opens the specified UART port (e.g. /dev/uart0 for port is 0).

Returns
Zero on success
int uart_read ( port_t  port,
void *  buf,
int  nbyte 
)

This function reads the UART.

Returns
Number of bytes read or -1 on error.
int uart_setattr ( port_t  port,
const uart_attr_t *  attr 
)

This function sets the UART attributes for the specified port.

Returns
Zero on success
int uart_write ( port_t  port,
const void *  buf,
int  nbyte 
)

This function writes the UART.

Returns
Number of bytes written or -1 on error.
